title: Pulpit AI turns sermons into multiple pieces of content with Claude \ Anthropic

metadata.title: Pulpit AI turns sermons into multiple pieces of content with Claude \ Anthropic
metadata.description: Anthropic is an AI safety and research company that's working to build reliable, interpretable, and steerable AI systems.
metadata.ogTitle: Pulpit AI Amplifies Sermons with Claude: 80% Cost Reduction, 200% Growth
metadata.ogDescription: Discover how Pulpit AI partnered with Anthropic's Claude to transform sermons into 20+ content pieces, reducing operational costs by 80% and growing their customer base by 200% in just 3 months. Learn how AI is revolutionizing faith-based communication.
